TeSS.util
Class SQLProperties

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--TeSS.util.SQLProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SQLProperties
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A list of SQL properties consisting of (field name, value) pairs. We cannot use java.util.Properties since it does not maintain any ordering.

See Also:
Serialized Form

removeProperty

public java.lang.String removeProperty(java.lang.String name)
Removes the specified property from this SQLProperties and returns it's value if the property existed or null otherwise.
Parameters:
name - - the name of the property to remove.
Returns:
The value of the removed property or null if no such property existed

hashCode

public int hashCode()
Dummy hashcode function: needed because of BUG in java.util.HashTable and java.util.HashSet. On set1.contains(object2), they call element.equals(object2) for some element of set1 only if the element satisfies element.hashCode() == object2.hashCode(). This violates the jdk 1.3 specification in java.util.Map
Overrides:
hashCode in class java.lang.Object
